member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.ActionsBlock
member.summary:
A block that is used to hold interactive elements.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/blocks#actions

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.ActionsBlock.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{SlackMessageBuilder.IActionsElement},System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An array of interactive element objects - buttons, select menus, overflow menus, or date pickers. There is a maximum of 25 elements in each action block.

A string acting as a unique identifier for a block. If not specified, a block_id will be generated. You can use this block_id when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters. block_id should be unique for each message and each iteration of a message. If a message is updated, use a new block_id.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ActionsBlock.Elements
member.summary: An array of interactive element objects - buttons, select menus, overflow menus, or date pickers. There is a maximum of 25 elements in each action block.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.AttachmentBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Fluent builder for s.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The type of element.

A string acting as a unique identifier for a block. If not specified, a block_id will be generated. You can use this block_id when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters. block_id should be unique for each message and each iteration of a message. If a message is updated, use a new block_id.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Block.BlockId
member.summary: A string acting as a unique identifier for a block. If not specified, a block_id will be generated. You can use this block_id when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters. block_id should be unique for each message and each iteration of a message. If a message is updated, use a new block_id.

member.summary: Adds an image block.

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.BlockBuilderExtensions.AddImageBlock(SlackMessageBuilder.IBlocksBuilder,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an image block.
member.param: The URL of the image to be displayed.
A plain-text summary of the image. This should not contain any markup. Maximum length for this field is 2000 characters.
An optional title for the image in the form of a text object that can only be of type: plain_text. Maximum length for the text in this field is 2000 characters.

A string acting as a unique identifier for a block. If not specified, a block_id will be generated. You can use this block_id when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters. block_id should be unique for each message and each iteration of a message. If a message is updated, use a new block_id.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.Button
member.summary:
An interactive component that inserts a button. The button can be a trigger for anything from opening a simple link to starting a complex workflow.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#button

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.Button.#ctor(SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{SlackMessageBuilder.ButtonStyle},SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A text object that defines the button's text. Can only be of type: plain_text. text may truncate with ~30 characters. Maximum length for the text in this field is 75 characters.

An identifier for the action triggered when the checkbox group is changed. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.

A URL to load in the user's browser when the button is clicked. Maximum length for this field is 3000 characters. If you're using url, you'll still receive an interaction payload and will need to send an acknowledgement response.
The value to send along with the interaction payload. Maximum length for this field is 2000 characters.
Decorates buttons with alternative visual color schemes. Use this option with restraint.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog after the button is clicked.
A label for longer descriptive text about a button element. This label will be read out by screen readers instead of the button text object. Maximum length for this field is 75 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Button.Text
member.summary: A text object that defines the button's text. Can only be of type: plain_text. text may truncate with ~30 characters. Maximum length for the text in this field is 75 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Button.ActionId
member.summary: An identifier for the action triggered when the checkbox group is changed. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Button.Url
member.summary: A URL to load in the user's browser when the button is clicked. Maximum length for this field is 3000 characters. If you're using url, you'll still receive an interaction payload and will need to send an acknowledgement response.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Button.Value
member.summary: The value to send along with the interaction payload. Maximum length for this field is 2000 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Button.Style
member.summary: Decorates buttons with alternative visual color schemes. Use this option with restraint.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Button.ConfirmDialog
member.summary: A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog after the button is clicked.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Button.AccessibilityLabel
member.summary: A label for longer descriptive text about a button element. This label will be read out by screen readers instead of the button text object. Maximum length for this field is 75 characters.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.ButtonStyle
member.summary: Button style

member.name: F:SlackMessageBuilder.ButtonStyle.Default
member.summary: Sets 'default' on output.

member.name: F:SlackMessageBuilder.ButtonStyle.Primary
member.summary: Sets 'primary' on output.

member.name: F:SlackMessageBuilder.ButtonStyle.Danger
member.summary: Sets 'danger' on output.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.Checkboxes
member.summary:
A checkbox group that allows a user to choose multiple items from a list of possible options.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#checkboxes

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.Checkboxes.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{SlackMessageBuilder.Option},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{SlackMessageBuilder.Option},SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An identifier for the action triggered when the checkbox group is changed. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.
An array of objects. A maximum of 10 options are allowed.
An array of objects that exactly matches one or more of the options within options. These options will be selected when the checkbox group initially loads.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after clicking one of the checkboxes in this element.
Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Checkboxes.ActionId
member.summary: An identifier for the action triggered when the checkbox group is changed. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Checkboxes.Options
member.summary: An array of objects. A maximum of 10 options are allowed.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Checkboxes.InitialOptions
member.summary: An array of objects that exactly matches one or more of the options within options. These options will be selected when the checkbox group initially loads.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Checkboxes.ConfirmDialog
member.summary: A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after clicking one of the checkboxes in this element.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Checkboxes.FocusOnLoad
member.summary: Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm
member.summary:
An object that defines a dialog that provides a confirmation step to any interactive element. This dialog will ask the user to confirm their action by offering a confirm and deny buttons.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/composition-objects#confirm

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm.#ctor(SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,SlackMessageBuilder.TextObject,SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.Nullable{SlackMessageBuilder.ButtonStyle})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A object that defines the dialog's title. Maximum length for this field is 100 characters.
A object that defines the explanatory text that appears in the confirm dialog. Maximum length for the text in this field is 300 characters.
A object object to define the text of the button that confirms the action. Maximum length for the text in this field is 30 characters.
A object to define the text of the button that cancels the action. Maximum length for the text in this field is 30 characters.

Defines the color scheme applied to the confirm button. A value of danger will display the button with a red background on desktop, or red text on mobile. A value of primary will display the button with a green background on desktop, or blue text on mobile. If this field is not provided, the default value will be primary.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm.Title
member.summary: A object that defines the dialog's title. Maximum length for this field is 100 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm.Text
member.summary: A object that defines the explanatory text that appears in the confirm dialog. Maximum length for the text in this field is 300 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm.ConfirmButtonText
member.summary: A object object to define the text of the button that confirms the action. Maximum length for the text in this field is 30 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm.DenyButtonText
member.summary: A object to define the text of the button that cancels the action. Maximum length for the text in this field is 30 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm.Style
member.summary: Defines the color scheme applied to the confirm button. A value of danger will display the button with a red background on desktop, or red text on mobile. A value of primary will display the button with a green background on desktop, or blue text on mobile. If this field is not provided, the default value will be primary.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.ContextBlock
member.summary:
Displays message context, which can include both images and text.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/blocks#context

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.ContextBlock.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{SlackMessageBuilder.IContextElement},System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An array of image elements and text objects. Maximum number of items is 10.

A string acting as a unique identifier for a block. If not specified, a block_id will be generated. You can use this block_id when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters. block_id should be unique for each message and each iteration of a message. If a message is updated, use a new block_id.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ContextBlock.Elements
member.summary: An array of image elements and text objects. Maximum number of items is 10.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationFilter
member.summary:
Provides a way to filter the list of options in a conversations select menu or conversations multi-select menu.
Please note that while none of the fields are individually required, you must supply at least one of these fields.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/composition-objects#filter_conversations

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationFilter.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Indicates which type of conversations should be included in the list. When this field is provided, any conversations that do not match will be excluded. You should provide an array of strings from the following options: im, mpim, private, and public. The array cannot be empty.
Indicates whether to exclude external shared channels from conversation lists. Defaults to false.
Indicates whether to exclude bot users from conversation lists. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationFilter.Include
member.summary: Indicates which type of conversations should be included in the list. When this field is provided, any conversations that do not match will be excluded. You should provide an array of strings from the following options: im, mpim, private, and public. The array cannot be empty.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationFilter.ExcludeExternalSharedChannels
member.summary: Indicates whether to exclude external shared channels from conversation lists. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationFilter.ExcludeBotUsers
member.summary: Indicates whether to exclude bot users from conversation lists. Defaults to false.

member.name: F:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationFilterOptions.IncludeIm
member.summary: im

member.name: F:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationFilterOptions.IncludeMpim
member.summary: mpim

member.name: F:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationFilterOptions.IncludePrivate
member.summary: private

member.name: F:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationFilterOptions.IncludePublic
member.summary: public

member.name: F:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationFilterOptions.ExcludeExternalSharedChannels
member.summary: exclude_external_shared_channels

member.name: F:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationFilterOptions.ExcludeBotUsers
member.summary: exclude_bot_users

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationsMultiSelect
member.summary:
This multi-select menu will populate its options with a list of public and private channels, DMs, and MPIMs visible to the current user in the active workspace.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#conversation_multi_select

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationsMultiSelect.#ctor(SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationFilter,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32},SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A object that defines the placeholder text shown on the menu. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.
An array of one or more IDs of any valid conversations to be pre-selected when the menu loads. If default_to_current_conversation is also supplied, initial_conversations will be ignored.
Pre-populates the select menu with the conversation that the user was viewing when they opened the modal, if available. Default is false.
Specifies the maximum number of items that can be selected in the menu. Minimum number is 1.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after a menu item is selected.

When set to true, the view_submission payload from the menu's parent view will contain a response_url. This response_url can be used for message responses. The target conversation for the message will be determined by the value of this select menu.
A object that reduces the list of available conversations using the specified criteria.
Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationsMultiSelect.InitialConversations
member.summary: An array of one or more IDs of any valid conversations to be pre-selected when the menu loads. If default_to_current_conversation is also supplied, initial_conversations will be ignored.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationsMultiSelect.MaxSelectedItems
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of items that can be selected in the menu. Minimum number is 1.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationsSelect
member.summary:
This select menu will populate its options with a list of public and private channels, DMs, and MPIMs visible to the current user in the active workspace.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#conversation_select

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationsSelect.#ctor(SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.String,System.String,SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationFilter,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A object that defines the placeholder text shown on the menu. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.
The ID of any valid conversation to be pre-selected when the menu loads. If default_to_current_conversation is also supplied, initial_conversation will take precedence.
Pre-populates the select menu with the conversation that the user was viewing when they opened the modal, if available. Default is false.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after a menu item is selected.

When set to true, the view_submission payload from the menu's parent view will contain a response_url. This response_url can be used for message responses. The target conversation for the message will be determined by the value of this select menu.
A object that reduces the list of available conversations using the specified criteria.
Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationsSelect.InitialConversation
member.summary: The ID of any valid conversation to be pre-selected when the menu loads. If default_to_current_conversation is also supplied, initial_conversation will take precedence.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Indicates whether the element will be a multi select.
A object that defines the placeholder text shown on the menu. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.
Pre-populates the select menu with the conversation that the user was viewing when they opened the modal, if available. Default is false.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after a menu item is selected.

When set to true, the view_submission payload from the menu's parent view will contain a response_url. This response_url can be used for message responses. The target conversation for the message will be determined by the value of this select menu.
A object that reduces the list of available conversations using the specified criteria.
Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationsSelectBase.DefaultToCurrentConversation
member.summary: Pre-populates the select menu with the conversation that the user was viewing when they opened the modal, if available. Default is false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationsSelectBase.ResponseUrlEnabled
member.summary: When set to true, the view_submission payload from the menu's parent view will contain a response_url. This response_url can be used for message responses. The target conversation for the message will be determined by the value of this select menu.
member.remarks: This field only works with menus in input blocks in modals.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ConversationsSelectBase.Filter
member.summary: A object that reduces the list of available conversations using the specified criteria.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.DatePicker
member.summary:
An element which lets users easily select a date from a calendar style UI.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#datepicker

member.summary: Initilizes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.

member.summary: An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.DatePicker.Placeholder
member.summary: A object that defines the placeholder text shown on the datepicker. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.DatePicker.InitialDate
member.summary: The initial date that is selected when the element is loaded. This should be in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.DatePicker.ConfirmDialog
member.summary: A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after a date is selected.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.DatePicker.FocusOnLoad
member.summary: Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.DispatchActionConfig
member.summary:
Determines when a plain-text input element will return a block_actions interaction payload.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/composition-objects#dispatch_action_config

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.DispatchActionConfig.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An array of interaction types that you would like to receive a block_actions payload for.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.DispatchActionConfig.TriggerActionsOn
member.summary:
An array of interaction types that you would like to receive a block_actions payload for. Should be one or both of:
on_enter_pressed — payload is dispatched when user presses the enter key while the input is in focus.Hint text will appear underneath the input explaining to the user to press enter to submit. on_character_entered — payload is dispatched when a character is entered (or removed) in the input.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.DividerBlock
member.summary:
A content divider, like an >hr<, to split up different blocks inside of a message. The divider block is nice and neat, requiring only a type.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/blocks#divider

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.DividerBlock.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A string acting as a unique identifier for a block. If not specified, a block_id will be generated. You can use this block_id when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters. block_id should be unique for each message and each iteration of a message. If a message is updated, use a new block_id.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.ExternalDataMultiSelect
member.summary:
This menu will load its options from an external data source, allowing for a dynamic list of options.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#external_multi_select

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.ExternalDataMultiSelect.#ctor(SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{SlackMessageBuilder.Option},System.Nullable{System.Int32},SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A object that defines the placeholder text shown on the menu. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.

When the typeahead field is used, a request will be sent on every character change. If you prefer fewer requests or more fully ideated queries, use the min_query_length attribute to tell Slack the fewest number of typed characters required before dispatch. The default value is 3.
An array of objects that exactly match one or more of the options within options or option_groups. These options will be selected when the menu initially loads.
Specifies the maximum number of items that can be selected in the menu. Minimum number is 1.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after a menu item is selected.
Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ExternalDataMultiSelect.InitialOptions
member.summary: An array of objects that exactly match one or more of the options within options or option_groups. These options will be selected when the menu initially loads.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ExternalDataMultiSelect.MaxSelectedItems
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of items that can be selected in the menu. Minimum number is 1.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.ExternalDataSelect
member.summary:
This select menu will load its options from an external data source, allowing for a dynamic list of options.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#external_select

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.ExternalDataSelect.#ctor(SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},SlackMessageBuilder.Option,SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A object that defines the placeholder text shown on the menu. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.

When the typeahead field is used, a request will be sent on every character change. If you prefer fewer requests or more fully ideated queries, use the min_query_length attribute to tell Slack the fewest number of typed characters required before dispatch. The default value is 3.
A single option that exactly matches one of the options within the options or option_groups loaded from the external data source. This option will be selected when the menu initially loads.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after a menu item is selected.
Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ExternalDataSelect.InitialOption
member.summary: A single option that exactly matches one of the options within the options or option_groups loaded from the external data source. This option will be selected when the menu initially loads.

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.ExternalDataSelectBase.#ctor(System.Boolean,SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Indicates whether the element will be a multi select.
A object that defines the placeholder text shown on the menu. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.

When the typeahead field is used, a request will be sent on every character change. If you prefer fewer requests or more fully ideated queries, use the min_query_length attribute to tell Slack the fewest number of typed characters required before dispatch. The default value is 3.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after a menu item is selected.
Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ExternalDataSelectBase.MinQueryLength
member.summary: When the typeahead field is used, a request will be sent on every character change. If you prefer fewer requests or more fully ideated queries, use the min_query_length attribute to tell Slack the fewest number of typed characters required before dispatch. The default value is 3.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.HeaderBlock
member.summary:
A header is a plain-text block that displays in a larger, bold font. Use it to delineate between different groups of content in your app's surfaces.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/blocks#header

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.HeaderBlock.#ctor(SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The text for the block, in the form of a plain_text text object. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

A string acting as a unique identifier for a block. If not specified, a block_id will be generated. You can use this block_id when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters. block_id should be unique for each message and each iteration of a message. If a message is updated, use a new block_id.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.HeaderBlock.Text
member.summary: The text for the block, in the form of a plain_text text object. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.IActionsElement
member.summary: An element that can be added to an actions block.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.ImageBlock
member.summary:
A simple image block, designed to make those cat photos really pop.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/blocks#image

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.ImageBlock.#ctor(System.String,System.String,SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The URL of the image to be displayed.
A plain-text summary of the image. This should not contain any markup. Maximum length for this field is 2000 characters.
An optional title for the image in the form of a text object that can only be of type: plain_text. Maximum length for the text in this field is 2000 characters.

A string acting as a unique identifier for a block. If not specified, one will be generated. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters. block_id should be unique for each message and each iteration of a message. If a message is updated, use a new block_id.

member.summary: The URL of the image to be displayed.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.ImageBlock.Title
member.summary: An optional title for the image in the form of a text object that can only be of type: plain_text. Maximum length for the text in this field is 2000 characters.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.InputBlock
member.summary:
A block that collects information from users - it can hold a plain-text input element, a checkbox element, a radio button element, a select menu element, a multi-select menu element, or a datepicker.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/blocks#input

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.InputBlock.#ctor(SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,SlackMessageBuilder.IInputElement,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A label that appears above an input element in the form of a text object that must have type of plain_text. Maximum length for the text in this field is 2000 characters.
A element, a element, a element, a element, a or a .
A boolean that indicates whether or not the use of elements in this block should dispatch a block_actions payload. Defaults to false.
An optional hint that appears below an input element in a lighter grey. It must be a text object with a type of plain_text. Maximum length for the text in this field is 2000 characters.
A boolean that indicates whether the input element may be empty when a user submits the modal. Defaults to false.

A string acting as a unique identifier for a block. If not specified, a block_id will be generated. You can use this block_id when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters. block_id should be unique for each message and each iteration of a message. If a message is updated, use a new block_id.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.InputBlock.Label
member.summary: A label that appears above an input element in the form of a text object that must have type of plain_text. Maximum length for the text in this field is 2000 characters.

member.summary: A element, a element, a element, a element, a or a .

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.InputBlock.DispatchAction
member.summary: A boolean that indicates whether or not the use of elements in this block should dispatch a block_actions payload. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.InputBlock.Hint
member.summary: An optional hint that appears below an input element in a lighter grey. It must be a text object with a type of plain_text. Maximum length for the text in this field is 2000 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.InputBlock.Optional
member.summary: A boolean that indicates whether the input element may be empty when a user submits the modal. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.MarkdownText
member.summary:
An object containing some text, formatted using mrkdwn, our proprietary contribution to the much beloved Markdown standard.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/composition-objects#text

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.MarkdownText.#ctor(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The text for the block. This field accepts any of the standard text formatting markup when type is mrkdwn. The maximum length is 3000 characters.

When set to false (as is default) URLs will be auto-converted into links, conversation names will be link-ified, and certain mentions will be automatically parsed. Using a value of true will skip any preprocessing of this nature, although you can still include manual parsing strings.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.MarkdownText.Verbatim
member.summary: When set to false (as is default) URLs will be auto-converted into links, conversation names will be link-ified, and certain mentions will be automatically parsed. Using a value of true will skip any preprocessing of this nature, although you can still include manual parsing strings.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.Option
member.summary:
An object that represents a single selectable item in a select menu, multi-select menu, checkbox group, radio button group, or overflow menu.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/composition-objects#option

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.Option.#ctor(SlackMessageBuilder.TextObject,System.String,SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A text object that defines the text shown in the option on the menu. Overflow, select, and multi-select menus can only use objects, while radio buttons and checkboxes can use objects. Maximum length for the text in this field is 75 characters.
A unique string value that will be passed to your app when this option is chosen.Maximum length for this field is 75 characters.
A object that defines a line of descriptive text shown below the text field beside the radio button. Maximum length for the text object within this field is 75 characters.

A URL to load in the user's browser when the option is clicked. The url attribute is only available in overflow menus. Maximum length for this field is 3000 characters. If you're using url, you'll still receive an interaction payload and will need to send an acknowledgement response.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Option.Text
member.summary: A text object that defines the text shown in the option on the menu. Overflow, select, and multi-select menus can only use objects, while radio buttons and checkboxes can use objects. Maximum length for the text in this field is 75 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Option.Value
member.summary: A unique string value that will be passed to your app when this option is chosen.Maximum length for this field is 75 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Option.Description
member.summary: A object that defines a line of descriptive text shown below the text field beside the radio button. Maximum length for the text object within this field is 75 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Option.Url
member.summary: A URL to load in the user's browser when the option is clicked. The url attribute is only available in overflow menus. Maximum length for this field is 3000 characters. If you're using url, you'll still receive an interaction payload and will need to send an acknowledgement response.

Provides a way to group options in a select menu or multi-select menu.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/composition-objects#option_group

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A object that defines the label shown above this group of options. Maximum length for the text in this field is 75 characters.
An array of objects that belong to this specific group. Maximum of 100 items.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.OptionsGroup.Label
member.summary: A object that defines the label shown above this group of options. Maximum length for the text in this field is 75 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.OptionsGroup.Options
member.summary: An array of objects that belong to this specific group. Maximum of 100 items.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.Overflow
member.summary:
This is like a cross between a button and a select menu - when a user clicks on this overflow button, they will be presented with a list of options to choose from. Unlike the select menu, there is no typeahead field, and the button always appears with an ellipsis ("…") rather than customisable text.
As such, it is usually used if you want a more compact layout than a select menu, or to supply a list of less visually important actions after a row of buttons.You can also specify simple URL links as overflow menu options, instead of actions.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#overflow

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.Overflow.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{SlackMessageBuilder.Option},SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.
An array of up to five option objects to display in the menu.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after a menu item is selected.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Overflow.ActionId
member.summary: An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Overflow.Options
member.summary: An array of up to five option objects to display in the menu.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.Overflow.ConfirmDialog
member.summary: A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after a menu item is selected.

An object containing some text, formatted either as plain_text.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.PlainTextInput
member.summary:
A plain-text input, similar to the HTML <input> tag, creates a field where a user can enter freeform data. It can appear as a single-line field or a larger text area using the multiline flag.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#input

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.PlainTextInput.#ctor(System.String,SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},SlackMessageBuilder.DispatchActionConfig,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.
A object that defines the placeholder text shown in the plain-text input. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.
The initial value in the plain-text input when it is loaded.
Indicates whether the input will be a single line (false) or a larger textarea (true). Defaults to false.
The minimum length of input that the user must provide. If the user provides less, they will receive an error. Maximum value is 3000.
The maximum length of input that the user can provide. If the user provides more, they will receive an error.
A dispatch configuration object that determines when during text input the element returns a block_actions payload.
Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.PlainTextInput.ActionId
member.summary: An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. member.summary: A object that defines the placeholder text shown in the plain-text input. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

member.summary: The initial value in the plain-text input when it is loaded.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.PlainTextInput.Multiline
member.summary: Indicates whether the input will be a single line (false) or a larger textarea (true). Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.PlainTextInput.MinLength
member.summary: The minimum length of input that the user must provide. If the user provides less, they will receive an error. Maximum value is 3000.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.PlainTextInput.MaxLength
member.summary: The maximum length of input that the user can provide. If the user provides more, they will receive an error.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.PlainTextInput.DispatchActionConfig
member.summary: A dispatch configuration object that determines when during text input the element returns a block_actions payload.

member.summary: Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.PublicChannelsMultiSelect
member.summary:
This multi-select menu will populate its options with a list of public channels visible to the current user in the active workspace.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#channel_multi_select

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.PublicChannelsMultiSelect.#ctor(SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Nullable{System.Int32},SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A object that defines the placeholder text shown on the menu. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.
An array of one or more IDs of any valid public channel to be pre-selected when the menu loads.
Specifies the maximum number of items that can be selected in the menu. Minimum number is 1.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after a menu item is selected.
Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.PublicChannelsSelect
member.summary:
This select menu will populate its options with a list of public channels visible to the current user in the active workspace.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#channel_select

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.PublicChannelsSelect.#ctor(SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A object that defines the placeholder text shown on the menu. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.
The ID of any valid public channel to be pre-selected when the menu loads.

When set to true, the view_submission payload from the menu's parent view will contain a response_url. This response_url can be used for message responses. The target channel for the message will be determined by the value of this select menu.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after a menu item is selected.
Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.summary: The ID of any valid public channel to be pre-selected when the menu loads.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.PublicChannelsSelect.ResponseUrlEnabled
member.summary: When set to true, the view_submission payload from the menu's parent view will contain a response_url. This response_url can be used for message responses. The target channel for the message will be determined by the value of this select menu.
member.remarks: This field only works with menus in input blocks in modals.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.SlackApiMessage.UnfurlLinks
member.summary: Pass true to enable unfurling of primarily text-based content.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.SlackApiMessage.UnfurlMedia

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.SlackMessage.#ctor(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{SlackMessageBuilder.IBlockElement},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{SlackMessageBuilder.Attachment},System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The usage of this field changes depending on whether you're using blocks or not. If you are, this is used as a fallback string to display in notifications. If you aren't, this is the main body text of the message. It can be formatted as plain text, or with mrkdwn. This field is not enforced as required when using blocks, however it is highly recommended that you include it as the aforementioned fallback.
Determines whether the text field is rendered according to mrkdwn formatting or not. Defaults to true.
An array of layout blocks in the same format as described in the building blocks guide.
An array of legacy secondary attachments. We recommend you use blocks instead.
The ID of another un-threaded message to reply to.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.SlackMessage.Text
member.summary: The usage of this field changes depending on whether you're using blocks or not. If you are, this is used as a fallback string to display in notifications. If you aren't, this is the main body text of the message. It can be formatted as plain text, or with mrkdwn. This field is not enforced as required when using blocks, however it is highly recommended that you include it as the aforementioned fallback.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.SlackMessage.IsMarkdown
member.summary: Determines whether the text field is rendered according to mrkdwn formatting or not. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.SlackMessage.Blocks
member.summary: An array of layout blocks in the same format as described in the building blocks guide.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.SlackMessage.Attachments
member.summary: An array of legacy secondary attachments. We recommend you use blocks instead.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.SlackMessage.ThreadId
member.summary: The ID of another un-threaded message to reply to.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.StaticMultiSelect
member.summary:
This is the simplest form of multi select menu, with a static list of options passed in when defining the element.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#static_multi_select
Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An array of objects that exactly match one or more of the options within options or option_groups. These options will be selected when the menu initially loads.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.StaticMultiSelect.InitialOptions
member.summary: An array of objects that exactly match one or more of the options within options or option_groups. These options will be selected when the menu initially loads.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.StaticMultiSelect.MaxSelectedItems
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of items that can be selected in the menu. Minimum number is 1.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.StaticSelect
member.summary:
This is the simplest form of select menu, with a static list of options passed in when defining the element.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#static_select

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.StaticSelect.InitalOption
member.summary: A single option that exactly matches one of the options within options or option_groups. This option will be selected when the menu initially loads.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.StaticSelectBase.Options
member.summary: An array of objects. Maximum number of options is 100. If option_groups is specified, this field should not be.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.StaticSelectBase.OptionGroups
member.summary: An array of objects. Maximum number of option groups is 100. If options is specified, this field should not be.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.TextFieldsSectionBlock
member.summary: A section is one of the most flexible blocks available - it can be used as a simple text block, in combination with text fields, or side-by-side with any of the available block elements.

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.TextFieldsSectionBlock.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText},SlackMessageBuilder.ISectionElement,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An array of text objects. Any text objects included with fields will be rendered in a compact format that allows for 2 columns of side-by-side text. Maximum number of items is 10. Maximum length for the text in each item is 2000 characters.
One of the available element objects.

A string acting as a unique identifier for a block. If not specified, a block_id will be generated. You can use this block_id when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters. block_id should be unique for each message and each iteration of a message. If a message is updated, use a new block_id.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.TextFieldsSectionBlock.Fields
member.summary: An array of text objects. Any text objects included with fields will be rendered in a compact format that allows for 2 columns of side-by-side text. Maximum number of items is 10. Maximum length for the text in each item is 2000 characters.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.TextObject
member.summary: An object containing some text, formatted either as plain_text or using mrkdwn, our proprietary contribution to the much beloved Markdown standard.

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.TextObject.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.TextObject.Text
member.summary: The text for the block. This field accepts any of the standard text formatting markup when type is mrkdwn. The maximum length is 3000 characters.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.TextSectionBlock
member.summary: A section is one of the most flexible blocks available - it can be used as a simple text block, in combination with text fields, or side-by-side with any of the available block elements.

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.TextSectionBlock.#ctor(SlackMessageBuilder.TextObject,SlackMessageBuilder.ISectionElement,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The text for the block, in the form of a text object. Maximum length for the text in this field is 3000 characters.
One of the available element objects.

A string acting as a unique identifier for a block. If not specified, a block_id will be generated. You can use this block_id when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters. block_id should be unique for each message and each iteration of a message. If a message is updated, use a new block_id.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.TextSectionBlock.Text
member.summary: The text for the block, in the form of a text object. Maximum length for the text in this field is 3000 characters.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.TimePicker
member.summary:
An element which allows selection of a time of day.
On desktop clients, this time picker will take the form of a dropdown list with free-text entry for precise choices. On mobile clients, the time picker will use native time picker UIs.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#timepicker

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.TimePicker.#ctor(System.String,SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An identifier for the action triggered when the checkbox group is changed. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.
A object that defines the placeholder text shown on the timepicker. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

The initial time that is selected when the element is loaded. This should be in the format HH:mm, where HH is the 24-hour format of an hour (00 to 23) and mm is minutes with leading zeros (00 to 59), for example 22:25 for 10:25pm.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after clicking one of the checkboxes in this element.
Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.TimePicker.ActionId
member.summary: An identifier for the action triggered when the checkbox group is changed. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.TimePicker.Placeholder
member.summary: A object that defines the placeholder text shown on the timepicker. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.TimePicker.InitialTime
member.summary: The initial time that is selected when the element is loaded. This should be in the format HH:mm, where HH is the 24-hour format of an hour (00 to 23) and mm is minutes with leading zeros (00 to 59), for example 22:25 for 10:25pm.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.TimePicker.ConfirmDialog
member.summary: A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after clicking one of the checkboxes in this element.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.TimePicker.FocusOnLoad
member.summary: Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.TypedObject
member.summary: The base of all typed objects.

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.TypedObject.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class.
member.param: The type of element.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.TypedObject.Type
member.summary: The type of element.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.UsersMultiSelect
member.summary:
This multi-select menu will populate its options with a list of Slack users visible to the current user in the active workspace.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#users_multi_select

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.UsersMultiSelect.#ctor(SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Nullable{System.Int32},SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A object that defines the placeholder text shown on the menu. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.
An array of user IDs of any valid users to be pre-selected when the menu loads.
Specifies the maximum number of items that can be selected in the menu. Minimum number is 1.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after a menu item is selected.
Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.UsersMultiSelect.InitialUsers
member.summary: An array of user IDs of any valid users to be pre-selected when the menu loads.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.UsersMultiSelect.MaxSelectedItems
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of items that can be selected in the menu. Minimum number is 1.

member.name: T:SlackMessageBuilder.UsersSelect
member.summary:
This select menu will populate its options with a list of Slack users visible to the current user in the active workspace.
https://api.slack.com/reference/block-kit/block-elements#users_select

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.
The user ID of any valid user to be pre-selected when the menu loads.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after a menu item is selected.
Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlackMessageBuilder.UsersSelect.InitialUser
member.summary: The user ID of any valid user to be pre-selected when the menu loads.

member.name: M:SlackMessageBuilder.UsersSelectBase.#ctor(System.Boolean,SlackMessageBuilder.PlainText,System.String,SlackMessageBuilder.Confirm,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Indicates whether the element will be a multi select.
A object that defines the placeholder text shown on the menu. Maximum length for the text in this field is 150 characters.

An identifier for the action triggered when a menu option is selected. You can use this when you receive an interaction payload to identify the source of the action. Should be unique among all other action_ids in the containing block. Maximum length for this field is 255 characters.
A object that defines an optional confirmation dialog that appears after a menu item is selected.
Indicates whether the element will be set to auto focus within the view object. Only one element can be set to true. Defaults to false.
